excerpts: THe garlic noodles are delicious and the dungenous crabs are definitely the way to go.
You really have to enjoy eating with a bib on, and you also need to enjoy the fact that you're going to get messy hands no matter what you're doing.
garlic noodles.author: Alexander L.
garlic noodles.review: I took my family here to hang out and talk to them about new stuff. THe garlic noodles are delicious and the dungenous crabs are definitely the way to go. You really have to enjoy eating with a bib on, and you also need to enjoy the fact that you're going to get messy hands no matter what you're doing.

excerpts: What I've tasted was good, but I thought over-priced for what it was, like the Prawns with the Garlic Noodles
; I think that one was something like $18.
Besides, for me, the other dishes pretty much paled next to the Roasted Garlic Crab.
Wait for the Dungeness Crabs to come in season so the market price isn't so steep
and you're getting more crab for your buck (starts around December).
They serve your crab on a large platter SWIMMING in melted butter, crusted in sea salt and coarse black pepper.
People dress up these days to eat at Thanh Long, but whatever, just make sure you can loosen the waistband, roll your sleeves back and tuck in.
Yes, very fashionable bibs are provided for the grub-down
you're embarking on
when you get the crab (there are other kinds of crab to choose, too, but again, I've never really noticed).
If you actually manage get to any accompanying dishes, yes, the garlic noodles are very tasty, and a good alternative to plain white rice.
garlic noodles.author: CINDY K.
garlic noodles.review:
This is the first of what's turning out to be a family-owned restaurant empire, a pretty inspiring story:
http://www.anfamily.com/portalpage.asp
The decor was once upon a time very humble at Thanh Long, but despite that, and a location waaaay out in the Outer Sunset, it's been extraordinarily successful.  The restaurant was remodeled a few years back, and now it's got gilt finishing on the walls and swanky martini cocktails. I've been there many times over the last 10 years and I'm ashamed to say I only tried a handful of their dishes.  What I've tasted was good, but I thought over-priced for what it was, like the Prawns with the Garlic Noodles; I think that one was something like $18.  
Besides, for me, the other dishes pretty much paled next to the Roasted Garlic Crab.  Wait for the Dungeness Crabs to come in season so the market price isn't so steep and you're getting more crab for your buck (starts around December). They serve your crab on a large platter SWIMMING in melted butter, crusted in sea salt and coarse black pepper. People dress up these days to eat at Thanh Long, but whatever, just make sure you can loosen the waistband, roll your sleeves back and tuck in.  Yes, very fashionable bibs are provided for the grub-down you're embarking on when you get the crab (there are other kinds of crab to choose, too, but again, I've never really noticed). If you actually manage get to any accompanying dishes, yes, the garlic noodles are very tasty, and a good alternative to plain white rice.

excerpts: Get the garlic noodles and roasted crabs.
That's all you need.
Oh...make sure you wear the bib..
you'd be incomplete without it.
garlic noodles.author: hello k.
garlic noodles.review: You can't go wrong with this place..the decor, service and food is terrific.  Get the garlic noodles and roasted crabs.  That's all you need.  Oh...make sure you wear the bib..you'd be incomplete without it.

excerpts: The garlic noodles are overrated, but the chicken fried rice was pretty good.
The rest of the dishes are good/ok, but the reason to come is the garlic crab!
garlic noodles.author: eric a.
garlic noodles.review: Finally, a place on yelp as advertised. The roats/garlic crab is phenomenal, and I don't where else I could get a similar dish as good, although it is very expensive. The garlic noodles are overrated, but the chicken fried rice was pretty good. The rest of the dishes are good/ok, but the reason to come is the garlic crab!

excerpts: i've heard about these famous garlic noodles for years and finally made my way to thanh long to try them.

g

forget the colossal royal tiger prawns i ordered to sit atop this dish (though i'm sure they were delicious), the garlic noodles were the star of the show.
garlic noodles.author: Thy N.
garlic noodles.review:
i've heard about these famous garlic noodles for years and finally made my way to thanh long to try them.

o
m
g

forget the colossal royal tiger prawns i ordered to sit atop this dish (though i'm sure they were delicious), the garlic noodles were the star of the show. this is serious garlic, people, they're not messin' around.

roasted crab lived up to the hype as well. couldn't resist ordering the tamarind crab though because my parents make this at home with pure perfection. not fair to compare a restaurant dish to a homemade dish, but thanh long would have to pack their knives and go. their tamarind was just ok.

all in all, totally worthy of the drive to this strange location. and in response to the warnings not to go here on a first date, i'd like to add: do not go here for dinner right before heading to the orpheum theatre to see wicked. oh, and don't arrive just as the lights are dimming to start the show. not only are you the annoying latecomers shuffling past people to get to your seats, you smell filthy disgusting. yeah, sorry bout that...

excerpts:
Amazing...
Garlic noodles.
The best crab I have ever had.
Great environment.
It is off the beaten path, but worth it if you can find it.
garlic noodles.author: Chris P.
garlic noodles.review:
My friend who grew up in SF took 5 guys to "his favorite restaurant in SF".  Amazing...
Garlic noodles.
The best crab I have ever had.
Great environment.
It is off the beaten path, but worth it if you can find it.

excerpts: I had about one and a quarter whole crab and one and a half servings of garlic noodles.
You know it has to be good stuff when one of my fellow diners exclaimed that this is better than the dinner at Gary Danko that he had the previous night.
I am sure he was just making a point about how gooood the crab and garlic noodles were, after all it is like comparing apples with oranges (I hope, at least for GD's sake).
While I am not a big crab fan I do like the crabs here - ok 'like' is an understatement considering that I am drooling here just thinking about the crabs and garlic noodles.

Just know that you will be getting down and dirty with the crab so it is not an attractive sight for first dates or any plans for a romantic evening, and you will be tasting the special sauce aka garlic for the next day or so, not to mention
eau
du garlic will be eminating out of your pores.
Do order one crab at a time because congeeled butter is not an appetizing sight (not that it stopped us from chowing down).

A final and important note - Crustacean has the same food and if you don't have the time to make the trek to sunset it will do, but Thanh Long's service and overall ambience is better than Crustacean.
garlic noodles.author: Joe L.
garlic noodles.review:
When
-you don't want to have a conversation with your dining companion(s) - as they will be too busy working the crab
-your out of town visitors want crab
-you are at risk of Dracula paying you a visit later in the evening

Not when
-first date
-second date
-important job interview the next morning

Here are my qualifications in writing this review - I've been here 3 times in the past 7 months - in each visit I had about one and a quarter whole crab and one and a half servings of garlic noodles.

You know it has to be good stuff when one of my fellow diners exclaimed that this is better than the dinner at Gary Danko that he had the previous night.  I am sure he was just making a point about how gooood the crab and garlic noodles were, after all it is like comparing apples with oranges (I hope, at least for GD's sake). While I am not a big crab fan I do like the crabs here - ok 'like' is an understatement considering that I am drooling here just thinking about the crabs and garlic noodles. Just know that you will be getting down and dirty with the crab so it is not an attractive sight for first dates or any plans for a romantic evening, and you will be tasting the special sauce aka garlic for the next day or so, not to mention eau du garlic will be eminating out of your pores. Do order one crab at a time because congeeled butter is not an appetizing sight (not that it stopped us from chowing down).  A final and important note - Crustacean has the same food and if you don't have the time to make the trek to sunset it will do, but Thanh Long's service and overall ambience is better than Crustacean.

excerpts: Garlic noodles & crab are the best!
Clean, fast & quick service is all I really need.
I only tried the garlic noodles & crab, but I'm hooked.
I would go back here again.
Casual atmosphere, just what I like.
garlic noodles.author: Annette Y.
garlic noodles.review: Garlic noodles & crab are the best! Clean, fast & quick service is all I really need.  I only tried the garlic noodles & crab, but I'm hooked. I would go back here again. Casual atmosphere, just what I like.

excerpts: SO GOOD, and the garlic noodles was very good as well.
I thought about ordering a to-go portion for the garlic noodles after the first bite (which I did hehe).
It was so good that my bf and I were constantly eating and didn't utter a word.
lol...
and when we did, we both said
the same.. damn that was GOOD!
We order the bo luc lac as well.
The bf liked it, but I didn't like it that much.
The seasoning didn't do it for me, but I liked the fact that the meat was very tender.. and they put pieces of potatoes in there.. that was yummy =).
I love PPQ
but I have to say...
I've been missing out for  long long time lol.
Hands down, Thanh Long is better.
The place was pretty packed for a Wednesday night , we made reservation so we didn't have to wait long.
Minus one star because the service could have been more on point...
but that's okay.
The food made up for it =).
Can't wait to come back to this place!
garlic noodles.author: Mimi C.
garlic noodles.review: DEFINITELY NOT OVERRATED. This place is deeeliciousss! I walked by the kitchen and it smelled SO GOOD. So I was waiting anxiously for the food. Definitely did not disappoint. I thought the crab was delicious (we ordered the roasted garlic). The sauce was very buttery, and I like buttery! SO GOOD, and the garlic noodles was very good as well. I thought about ordering a to-go portion for the garlic noodles after the first bite (which I did hehe). It was so good that my bf and I were constantly eating and didn't utter a word. lol... and when we did, we both said the same.. damn that was GOOD! We order the bo luc lac as well. The bf liked it, but I didn't like it that much. The seasoning didn't do it for me, but I liked the fact that the meat was very tender.. and they put pieces of potatoes in there.. that was yummy =). I love PPQ but I have to say... I've been missing out for  long long time lol. Hands down, Thanh Long is better.   The place was pretty packed for a Wednesday night , we made reservation so we didn't have to wait long. Minus one star because the service could have been more on point... but that's okay.  The food made up for it =). Can't wait to come back to this place!

excerpts: ditto previous reviews:  ROASTED CRAB & GARLIC NOODLES!!!!!
wear a bib & be prepared to work for your crab..............at the end, you'll lick your lips & say ahhhhh...........
garlic noodles.author: Cindi N.
garlic noodles.review:
ditto previous reviews:  ROASTED CRAB & GARLIC NOODLES!!!!!  wear a bib & be prepared to work for your crab..............at the end, you'll lick your lips & say ahhhhh...........the work was hard but well worth it!!!!!

why the 4 stars, cause....its really hard work!!!!

excerpts: The roasted crab and garlic noodles are to die for.
Very greasy, but yummy.
I was looking around at what other tables were having and it looks like their food is good.
I only tried their roasted crab and garlic noodles
and I'm pretty sure that's all I'll be getting when I go back.
Yummy!
After dinner, we had dessert.
My boyfriend and I tried the fried ice cream, which was ok.
I've had better.
garlic noodles.author: Linda I.
garlic noodles.review:
Oh man, oh man. The roasted crab and garlic noodles are to die for. Very greasy, but yummy. I was looking around at what other tables were having and it looks like their food is good.  I only tried their roasted crab and garlic noodles and I'm pretty sure that's all I'll be getting when I go back. Yummy! After dinner, we had dessert. My boyfriend and I tried the fried ice cream, which was ok. I've had better. Our friends tried the fried banana with ice cream, which looked pretty darn delicious. 

The only reason why I'm giving 4 stars instead of 5 is because I felt a little rushed to finish our food and get out. The owner was standing right behind our booth and she kept glaring at us. Her eyes were telling us to hurry up so that other customers could eat. I'm not a fan of that.

excerpts: I think the only 3 things that are good here are the roast crab, garlic noodles, and the colossal tiger prawns.
Overall, 4 stars for the garlic noodles and crab.
garlic noodles.author: amanda c.
garlic noodles.review:
I think the only 3 things that are good here are the roast crab, garlic noodles, and the colossal tiger prawns. We also ordered the jumbo prawn wontons which literally was a shrimp w/ its tail stil on it inside a fried egg roll wrapper. So when you eat the "wonton" you get a big bite of a crunchy tail. Gross. It had no flavor. I thought I would get something more interesting for the exorbitant price. Also ordered the vegetable soup. It was Meh..

I thought the service was ok. I felt like they were just trying to get us out of there. I was still eating some crab and the bus boy came and cleared the crab bowl and crab plate away. I was like..hello! i'm still eating here!

So, I'd stick with the 3 items mentioned above and wouldn't deviate from them. Overall, 4 stars for the garlic noodles and crab.

excerpts: Oh love of mine, it's garlic noodles and roasted crab time!
It's just amazing that you can get crab dishes prepared many ways all around the city, but hands-down, no one does it as well as World Famous Thanh Long!
I actually learned of this place from folk who don't even live in the area.
Who'da thought they would know of a restaurant surrounded by houses out in the middle of the fog belt?
The crab is tasty and spiced beautifully to tease and please your taste buds.
Of course we had to order more garlic noodles now
didn't we?
Ate so much good food that... oops, there goes another shirt button.
Well you get the picture, "It's as good as it gets.
garlic noodles.author: Gina A.
garlic noodles.review: Oh love of mine, it's garlic noodles and roasted crab time! It's just amazing that you can get crab dishes prepared many ways all around the city, but hands-down, no one does it as well as World Famous Thanh Long! I actually learned of this place from folk who don't even live in the area. Who'da thought they would know of a restaurant surrounded by houses out in the middle of the fog belt? The crab is tasty and spiced beautifully to tease and please your taste buds. Of course we had to order more garlic noodles now didn't we? Ate so much good food that... oops, there goes another shirt button. Well you get the picture, "It's as good as it gets."

excerpts: Garlic noodles and roasted crab, what else do i need to say...   Love this place!
garlic noodles.author: S L.
garlic noodles.review: Garlic noodles and roasted crab, what else do i need to say...   Love this place!

excerpts: The garlic noodles are to die for, I usually get the roast crab, quick tip, wear the bib
garlic noodles.author: Dizzy L.
garlic noodles.review: The garlic noodles are to die for, I usually get the roast crab, quick tip, wear the bib

excerpts: Although this is a bit far from everywhere, you can't go wrong with the dungenees crab and the garlic noodles (though can be a bit buttery/oily at times).
garlic noodles.author: Marco d.
garlic noodles.review: Nothing beats the original location.  A trip to SFO is not complete without a visit to this institution. Although this is a bit far from everywhere, you can't go wrong with the dungenees crab and the garlic noodles (though can be a bit buttery/oily at times).

excerpts: I grew up and went on a date with a guy who can afford this place that I realized this is one classy restaurant that serves the best garlic roasted crab and garlic noodles.
At first I was a bit embarassed when the waiter tried to put the bib on me since I was on a date with a cute guy.
But, as I looked around the room, everyone had one on, so I happily let the watier put my bib on me.
When the glorious roast crab and garlic noodles arrived, I forgot I was on a date and just grabbed a crab leg and started munching away!
I almost bit my date's hand when he was reaching to get the last of the garlic noodles!
Even though I am a bit allergic to crab, but with a few tablets of Claritin, I can eat at Thanh Long everyday!
garlic noodles.author: Annie L.
garlic noodles.review: I grew up on 48th and Judah and during my daily trips on the N-Judah, I always wondered what kind of place had a picture of a crab over the door. It was not untill I grew up and went on a date with a guy who can afford this place that I realized this is one classy restaurant that serves the best garlic roasted crab and garlic noodles. At first I was a bit embarassed when the waiter tried to put the bib on me since I was on a date with a cute guy. But, as I looked around the room, everyone had one on, so I happily let the watier put my bib on me. When the glorious roast crab and garlic noodles arrived, I forgot I was on a date and just grabbed a crab leg and started munching away! I almost bit my date's hand when he was reaching to get the last of the garlic noodles! Even though I am a bit allergic to crab, but with a few tablets of Claritin, I can eat at Thanh Long everyday! :)

excerpts: If you ever come here you got to get the Garlic Roasted Crab and Garlic noodles.
It was the most amazing combo ever.
Honestly if you haven't had either of these you are missing out.
No review can ever explain the flavors of these items.
garlic noodles.author: Frank L.
garlic noodles.review: If you ever come here you got to get the Garlic Roasted Crab and Garlic noodles. It was the most amazing combo ever. Honestly if you haven't had either of these you are missing out. No review can ever explain the flavors of these items.

excerpts: I have dreams about the garlic noodles..seriously.
It's been a while since I have been here, but I am planning on returning this spring when I visit San Fran.
Why can't I have a place like this where I live?
Oh, that's right, because San Francisco has the best food in the world :-(
garlic noodles.author: Sandy S.
garlic noodles.review: I have dreams about the garlic noodles..seriously. It's been a while since I have been here, but I am planning on returning this spring when I visit San Fran. Why can't I have a place like this where I live? Oh, that's right, because San Francisco has the best food in the world :-(

excerpts: At this point i dont even look at the menu anymore since I always get the Crab and garlic noodles!!!
garlic noodles.author: Patrick K.
garlic noodles.review: Ive been going to this place for years!!! At this point i dont even look at the menu anymore since I always get the Crab and garlic noodles!!!

excerpts: This place is great and everyone in here has a bib on and seems to be eating just about the same thing, crab and garlic noodles.
I'll take away one star because it's nearly impossible to find parking.
garlic noodles.author: John L.
garlic noodles.review: This place is great and everyone in here has a bib on and seems to be eating just about the same thing, crab and garlic noodles. I'll take away one star because it's nearly impossible to find parking.

excerpts: The Garlic Noodles and roasted crab are super tasty.
I came here for my friends dad's bday for a pretty large group.
Service was fast and they kept taking our bowls for the crab shells and giving us new ones.
ha ha.
Warning don't go here on a first date if you don't know how to crack your crabs.
It's so messy yet so tasty.
garlic noodles.author: donna y.
garlic noodles.review: Yummy in my Tummy.  The Garlic Noodles and roasted crab are super tasty. I came here for my friends dad's bday for a pretty large group. Service was fast and they kept taking our bowls for the crab shells and giving us new ones. ha ha. Warning don't go here on a first date if you don't know how to crack your crabs. It's so messy yet so tasty.

excerpts: Crab and garlic noodles all the way.
Their lychee martini is of the hook too for you twenty one n over folks.
garlic noodles.author: bella h.
garlic noodles.review: Yay for living only two blocks away fr this establishment, but from my entire lifetime i have only been here once. The food is definitely pricy (50 bones for a crab), but its all worth it. Crab and garlic noodles all the way. Their lychee martini is of the hook too for you twenty one n over folks.

excerpts: you must absolutely get the garlic noodles.
actually, get two plates.
And  while you are at it, order two of everything!
All the plates are sooo small.
fried icecream is on the top of the must haves here too.
wish it wasn't so 'fancy' here, but all in all a place you should try at least once.
garlic noodles.author: Abigail W.
garlic noodles.review: yum! you must absolutely get the garlic noodles. actually, get two plates. And  while you are at it, order two of everything! All the plates are sooo small. fried icecream is on the top of the must haves here too. wish it wasn't so 'fancy' here, but all in all a place you should try at least once.

excerpts: Don't miss the garlic noodles and roasted crab.
The seasonal mixed vegetables are also really good (I think they use some of the garlic buttery sauce on them), crispy and lightly steamed.
If you have any room, the banana bread pudding and banana cake are great desserts.
My husband is Vietnamese and we took his parents here with fingers crossed...they loved it!
garlic noodles.author: Bridget L.
garlic noodles.review: Don't miss the garlic noodles and roasted crab.  The seasonal mixed vegetables are also really good (I think they use some of the garlic buttery sauce on them), crispy and lightly steamed.  If you have any room, the banana bread pudding and banana cake are great desserts.  My husband is Vietnamese and we took his parents here with fingers crossed...they loved it!

excerpts: The crab and garlic noodles tasted ok, but the crab not as fresh as I expected.
The level of quality did not justified the high price.
Service level was not at par either.
Again,it would have been fine if they didn't present themselves as a "$$$" restaurant.
At that price level, I'd expected a "piece of heaven" with each and every bite....
but I didn't happened.
garlic noodles.author: Jenn L.
garlic noodles.review: We've been here once before 2 years ago, but I think they raised the price dramatically and made it look a bit high end.  The crab and garlic noodles tasted ok, but the crab not as fresh as I expected.   The level of quality did not justified the high price.  Service level was not at par either.  Again,it would have been fine if they didn't present themselves as a "$$$" restaurant.  At that price level, I'd expected a "piece of heaven" with each and every bite....but I didn't happened.

excerpts: roasted crab, garlic noodles, calamari, and mango salad
, this is what my wifey
and I order every time we come here.
You cant go wrong here.
This is one of my top 10 favorite restaurant.
garlic noodles.author: Reese D.
garlic noodles.review: roasted crab, garlic noodles, calamari, and mango salad, this is what my wifey and I order every time we come here. You cant go wrong here. This is one of my top 10 favorite restaurant.

excerpts: HOWEVER, the garlic noodles are SUPER yummy, and the Tiger prawns are delicious!
The atmosphere is nice, and service is very good.
garlic noodles.author: Eileen H.
garlic noodles.review: ...three and a half stars, really.  To me, the crab is way overrated.  It is dripping with all the seasonings and all that, but I feel that the meat itself isn't that tasty.  It's also pretty pricey.  I prefer PPQ on Clement to Thanh Long.  HOWEVER, the garlic noodles are SUPER yummy, and the Tiger prawns are delicious!  The atmosphere is nice, and service is very good.

excerpts: Do I love garlic noodles and crab with tamarind sauce!
I would marry this meal if I could!
No lie's!
garlic noodles.author: Christina B.
garlic noodles.review: OH MY LORD. Do I love garlic noodles and crab with tamarind sauce! I would marry this meal if I could! No lie's!

excerpts: The garlic noodles are to die for too!
garlic noodles.author: Mytwocent S.
garlic noodles.review:
The only place in the Bay Area I go for excellent roasted crab. Be sure to ask for extra napkins because the crab, shell and all, is swimming in melted buttery goodness. The garlic noodles are to die for too!

Psst. -  if you're on a diet don't bother ordering the crab without the sauce. You're missing out on the Thanh Long experience and could get crab served that way anywhere.

excerpts: Located in the middle of nowhere in the Sunset, this restaurant amazes me with its Garlic crab and garlic noodles.
The same owners as Crusteceans..family owned.
They have an awesome website portraying the history of their restaurants with pictures dating back from Colonial Vietnam.
garlic noodles.author: Prescott T.
garlic noodles.review: Located in the middle of nowhere in the Sunset, this restaurant amazes me with its Garlic crab and garlic noodles. The same owners as Crusteceans..family owned. They have an awesome website portraying the history of their restaurants with pictures dating back from Colonial Vietnam.

excerpts: We had a mango salad, garlic noodles and roast crab.
The mangoes were warm in the salad which was different but I enjoyed it.
The garlic noodles were delicious.
The crab was ok.
I requested vinegar because my Filipino side required it.
It was very noisy and busy by the time the food came out.
The experience was good
but I don't think I will be returning for their $40 crab.
Our waitress was very attentive which was great
but I prefer my mom's instead.
garlic noodles.author: Bianca D.
garlic noodles.review: My boyfriend has been dying to take me here for over a year and one day we actually found the time to go.  We arrived promptly at 5 and were seated immediately without reservations.  I let him do the ordering.  We had a mango salad, garlic noodles and roast crab.  The mangoes were warm in the salad which was different but I enjoyed it.  The garlic noodles were delicious.  The crab was ok.  I requested vinegar because my Filipino side required it.  It was very noisy and busy by the time the food came out.  The experience was good but I don't think I will be returning for their $40 crab.  Our waitress was very attentive which was great but I prefer my mom's instead.

excerpts: It's true, the garlic noodles are awesome, but you come for the crab, right?
I was totally disappointed.
I don't think a live crab has been in the building in the last 10 years.
I get the feeling this might have been the spot for crab sometime back in the day, but now it caters to a much broader audience and is milking its rep.
The place suggests an upscale overpriced ethnic Red Lobster.
I have to mention that the staff there is first class, and are almost enough to push this to 3 stars.
Almost.
garlic noodles.author: Drinky C.
garlic noodles.review: It's true, the garlic noodles are awesome, but you come for the crab, right?  I was totally disappointed.  I don't think a live crab has been in the building in the last 10 years.  I get the feeling this might have been the spot for crab sometime back in the day, but now it caters to a much broader audience and is milking its rep.  The place suggests an upscale overpriced ethnic Red Lobster.  I have to mention that the staff there is first class, and are almost enough to push this to 3 stars.  Almost.

excerpts: I can't get enough of Thanh Long's garlic noodles and garlic roasted crab!
Last time I went
I tried the shaking beef to mix things up....
it was good but not nearly as good as the crab and noodles.
Service is good and valet is available (which is good because parking can be a b*tch).
This place is one of my favorites!
garlic noodles.author: Monica D.
garlic noodles.review: I can't get enough of Thanh Long's garlic noodles and garlic roasted crab! Last time I went I tried the shaking beef to mix things up....it was good but not nearly as good as the crab and noodles. Service is good and valet is available (which is good because parking can be a b*tch). This place is one of my favorites!

excerpts: Now the menu:  You should only order the roasted crab and the garlic noodles here.
Everything else is very mediocre and some below standards.
This whole roasted crab and garlic noodle thing should really be limited to once per year.
The roasted crab and garlic noodles were not bad either.
garlic noodles.author: tiana w.
garlic noodles.review:
Oh oh oh, surprisingly so the lychee martini is the best I've ever tasted in my life and really you must trust me on this because my liver has seen the world.

Now the menu:  You should only order the roasted crab and the garlic noodles here.  Everything else is very mediocre and some below standards.
This whole roasted crab and garlic noodle thing should really be limited to once per year.  The immense amount of butter they put in both those dishes nearly gave me a heart attack on the spot.  

4 stars for the best lychee martini ever!  The roasted crab and garlic noodles were not bad either.

excerpts: And the garlic noodles are killer, too - so simple and yet sooo delicious.
I've taken many out-of-town/out-of-country friend and relative here, and everyone still raves about this place.
Make sure you make reservations and show up on time - the place gets packed and the wait can be long.
garlic noodles.author: Marc-Oliver F.
garlic noodles.review: If you like crab, this is your place!! And the garlic noodles are killer, too - so simple and yet sooo delicious. I've taken many out-of-town/out-of-country friend and relative here, and everyone still raves about this place. Make sure you make reservations and show up on time - the place gets packed and the wait can be long.

excerpts: **, garlic noodles*
** (you have to eat these hot).
I'm close to reproducing the garlic noodles!!!
garlic noodles.author: Cammy H.
garlic noodles.review: 4.5 Stars. The food is still great here after all these years (and renovations) and they did well on service for our party of 14. Reservations needed and go early :). Our typical order: mango/scallop/shrimp salad, shaken beef, garlic roast crab***, garlic noodles*** (you have to eat these hot). The Ahn secret recipes of the garlic roast crab and noodles in the special little kitchen - these are a MUST. A taste of heaven. Seems like their shaken beef is using a different cut of beef (used to be tenderloin). I've tried a bunch of other stuff on the menu, but haven't been blown away by them. I've been meaning to try PPQ as a comparison...Crustacean isn't as good in my opinion. I'm close to reproducing the garlic noodles!!!

excerpts: I love thier crab and garlic noodles.
It's absolutely divine.
Here and only here, I'm not afraid to eat with my fingers and lossen my belt.
garlic noodles.author: Sue L.
garlic noodles.review: Yum Yum Yum. I love thier crab and garlic noodles. It's absolutely divine. Here and only here, I'm not afraid to eat with my fingers and lossen my belt.

excerpts: Holy Roasted Dungeness Crab and Garlic Noodles!
Some of the best I've tasted by far.
garlic noodles.author: Leroid D.
garlic noodles.review: Holy Roasted Dungeness Crab and Garlic Noodles! Some of the best I've tasted by far. Other dishes like their Mango Salad and Stuffed Calamari are terrific also. Be prepared to go to the ATM at 7-11s across the street... because those seafood "market value" prices can pinch you in the wallet. Parking can be a bummer, but they do offer valet for $9 (as of 8/2006).

excerpts: Calamari and Garlic Noodles here is good and they have a full bar!
Atmosphere is really nice.
Definitely make a reservation before going.
garlic noodles.author: Nancy N.
garlic noodles.review: Thanh Long is a great place for local neighbors in the sunset cause there's barely any restaurants near here. There's not a big variety of crab but the roasted crab will do. Calamari and Garlic Noodles here is good and they have a full bar! ;) Atmosphere is really nice. Definitely make a reservation before going.

excerpts: of course the recommended is the crab and garlic noodles....
the garlic smell in your mouth lasts FOREVER.
i brushed, listerined, brushed and listerined again... but the smell of garlic still wouldn't go away.
don't let that scare you though...
garlic noodles.author: Mei N.
garlic noodles.review:
not as good as a remembered from years ago but it's still damn good.

of course the recommended is the crab and garlic noodles.... the garlic smell in your mouth lasts FOREVER. i brushed, listerined, brushed and listerined again... but the smell of garlic still wouldn't go away. don't let that scare you though... it's so f'ing good.

i prefer the drunken crab over the roast crab. mmm... besure to soak up the crab meat with the juices on your plate. 

we also had the saigon beef... let's just say that i think it's way overpriced. $19.95 for a few pieces of beef on top of a salad. 

and parking does get tight around that area. luckily they've got valet parking.

personal fave: drunken crab

excerpts: asides from the garlic noodles, tiger prawns and the roasted crab
i honestly have no clue about the rest of menu....
garlic noodles.author: Swarup B.
garlic noodles.review:
asides from the garlic noodles, tiger prawns and the roasted crab i honestly have no clue about the rest of menu....  these 3 items demand a standing ovation and i will give them one right now...

*standing up*

*clapping enthusiastically*

*sitting down*

ahem.... go there now and revel in shell fish heaven...

excerpts: This is a great place for roasted crab and garlic noodles.
These should be the only 2 dishes ordered.
I would have given 5 stars t the crabs weren't so damn expensive.
They're good but not worth 50% more than their competitors.
garlic noodles.author: LKT T.
garlic noodles.review: This is a great place for roasted crab and garlic noodles.  These should be the only 2 dishes ordered.  I would have given 5 stars t the crabs weren't so damn expensive.  They're good but not worth 50% more than their competitors.

excerpts: The colossal royal tiger prawns were really nothing to brag about, but the garlic noodles.....
wow
they were delicious.
I would come back here, just for the garlic noodles.
I do know I'll be back for the garlic noodles though.
garlic noodles.author: carebear l.
garlic noodles.review: My bf brought me here for a birthday surprise romantic dinner here.  We kind of have this unfinished business/ past history thing at this establishment. For appetizers we ordered the Thanh Long mussels, which came with little toasted crostini, the mussels were cooked really well and were not chewy at all  and the salt and pepper squid was lightly battered and not overcooked. For soups we ordered asian bouillabaisse, which was tasty, with just the perfect amount of tamarind. For entrees we ordered the steamed sea bass, which I thought was just a tad overcooked, but the sauce was good. The colossal royal tiger prawns were really nothing to brag about, but the garlic noodles.....wow they were delicious. I would come back here, just for the garlic noodles. The drunken crab tasted like soapy dishwater to me, I guess I should have ordered the Roasted crab. The service was great, but the silverware was dirty. I would come back here, but the food is just too overpriced. A lot of these dishes you can definitely order at another restaurant for half the price and will taste just as good if not better. It's kind of funny how some of the dishes are home style type of dishes, but the names are changed to sound a lot more sophisticated so that they can charge an arm and a leg. Overall , I give the food and service a 4 stars, but they get 3 stars for overcharging for the dishes that are home style and can be found in many Vietnamese kitchens. I do know I'll be back for the garlic noodles though.

excerpts: and they all know about the roasted garlic crab and garlic noodles.
garlic noodles.author: jen b.
garlic noodles.review:
exactly like  Crustacean, but cheaper and no cloth napkins or tablecloths.  (tee-hee)  seriously, i know people all over the bay area and somehow they all know about this place in the far, far, far away land of outer sunset.  even people who live in the east bay and NEVER travel to sf.  and they all know about the roasted garlic crab and garlic noodles.  it really amazes me.  

this is a place definitely worth the adventure to outer sunset, at least once.  make sure you've got your passport.  :)  the non-crab entrees are also good.  that is if you want to be a non-conformist.  "i can't believe you're not ordering crab!  what's wrong with you?  you must be a terrorist.  conform, bastard, conform!!"  ummm, i think i'll cut the caffeine now.

excerpts:
skip appetizers
get tamarind or roast crab
get garlic noodles
go home tres satisfied
garlic noodles.author: Abcde Q.
garlic noodles.review:
skip appetizers
get tamarind or roast crab
get garlic noodles
go home tres satisfied

excerpts: We were seated immediately and were able to order a Roasted Crab, Drunken Crab and Garlic Noodles very quickly.
garlic noodles.author: Matt K.
garlic noodles.review:
Wow, this place was FAST!!! We decided to get "appetizers" here before while waiting for a table at another restaurant! (I know I know, trust me, we were all THAT hungry) We were seated immediately and were able to order a Roasted Crab, Drunken Crab and Garlic Noodles very quickly. 

Honestly, we waited for about 5 minutes and had our food on the table. HOW WONDERFUL!!! I doubted it because when food comes out that quick, it usually means it was sitting there, but the crabs were done perfectly and as soon as the food hit the table, all talking stopped!

I have eaten at Crustacean and PPQ and I would put this in the middle of both of them. The crab quality was better than PPQ, more expensive, but not quite as expensive as Crustacean. Ambiance was nicer than PPQ but not quite as nice as Crustacean. Service was also better than PPQ, but definitely not as good as Crustacean.

excerpts: However i could just order plates of their garlic noodles and eat that for a month.
Great service
and there is not dress code.
It's laid back compared to it's sister restaurant Crustacean in the financial district.
I would recommend to have reservations at this place.
garlic noodles.author: Kim N.
garlic noodles.review: The roasted crab and stuff calamari is awesome.  However i could just order plates of their garlic noodles and eat that for a month.  Great service and there is not dress code.  It's laid back compared to it's sister restaurant Crustacean in the financial district.  I would recommend to have reservations at this place.

excerpts: I have never had noodles as wonderful as the garlic noodles here how can a dish that looks this simple become of symphony of heavenly favors on my palate.
I love crab and I can't recall a time where I have had better
, it is a little out of the way-
but well worth it!
garlic noodles.author: Gracie A.
garlic noodles.review: Mmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmm.... Thanh Long.... their crab and garlic noodlles are beyond anything that I can possibly describe. The look and feel of the place is "aight" and for a second when I walked in I had doubted my friend's reviews about this place... but I inhaled and my mouth watered. I have never had noodles as wonderful as the garlic noodles here how can a dish that looks this simple become of symphony of heavenly favors on my palate. I love crab and I can't recall a time where I have had better, it is a little out of the way- but well worth it!

excerpts: When you go order the Drunken Crab, Shaken Beef, and Garlic Noodles.
If you do that you cannot go wrong!
garlic noodles.author: Diane B.
garlic noodles.review: Love it!  Basically it is like Nike you've just got to do it.  When you go order the Drunken Crab, Shaken Beef, and Garlic Noodles.  If you do that you cannot go wrong!

excerpts: The garlic noodles are a necessary side order as well.
You will walk out of this place with your pores exuding garlic and oil.
It's amazing
garlic noodles.author: Jordan S.
garlic noodles.review: My dad first ate here when it opened in 1972.  He's been talking about some crazy roasted crab place in the sunset for my whole life.  It wasn't until a month ago I stumbled upon it and I must say it blew me away.  There is only one thing to order there, the roasted crab.  The waiter said they go through 150-200+crabs a day.  The garlic noodles are a necessary side order as well.  You will walk out of this place with your pores exuding garlic and oil.  It's amazing

excerpts: The garlic noodles were really good.
garlic noodles.author: Brian W.
garlic noodles.review:
Good, but average and over priced. The crab is literally covered with lots of buttery, salt and pepper. You literally want to drink a whole gallon of water after you leave. The garlic noodles were really good. Service was good and the drinks were mild and good tasting.

Will come back.....in a couple of years. :)

excerpts: all i have to say is DEEEELICIOUS roasted crab and garlic noodles!
i don't need to repeat what the other reviews have said!
just make sure you've got your hair tie ready to tie your hair back and don't be afraid to put some strength into cracking your crabs!
enjoy :)
garlic noodles.author: Coriemae P.
garlic noodles.review: all i have to say is DEEEELICIOUS roasted crab and garlic noodles!  i don't need to repeat what the other reviews have said!  just make sure you've got your hair tie ready to tie your hair back and don't be afraid to put some strength into cracking your crabs!  enjoy :)

excerpts: Roast Crab + Garlic Noodles =
One Good Time.
Warning: you'll be sweating garlic for days...
garlic noodles.author: Marie M.
garlic noodles.review: I love this place. Even though it's way out by the ocean, be sure to make a reservation for dinner because it's usually crowded every night of the week. Don't fall for the $9 valet parking. It never takes me more than two loops to find a spot. Oh, and don't bother looking at the menu...Roast Crab + Garlic Noodles = One Good Time. Warning: you'll be sweating garlic for days...

excerpts: I totally remember the Tamarind Crab and Garlic Noodles
and it's been over FIVE years.
UGH What I would give to go there right now (lol I will probably head over to The Crustacean)...
we had some other stuff too
but I don't remember them as vividly as the tamarind crab and garlic noodles.
You know it's good when you remember it for that long!
but I don't remember them as vividly as the tamarind crab and garlic noodles.
You know it's good when you remember it for that long!
garlic noodles.author: Tina M.
garlic noodles.review: All I have to say is *DRROOOOL* and I wish I still lived in SF. I'm 1/2 Viet and my uncle/aunt brought me here once and it's one of the best Viet restaurants I've been to (next to the now closed Golden Turtle). I totally remember the Tamarind Crab and Garlic Noodles and it's been over FIVE years. UGH What I would give to go there right now (lol I will probably head over to The Crustacean)... we had some other stuff too but I don't remember them as vividly as the tamarind crab and garlic noodles. You know it's good when you remember it for that long!

excerpts: When I was a toddler my parents came here for the same delicious crab and garlic noodles they serve now, only before Crustacean made them famous and high-end, the prices were low enough for bike messengers to afford.
garlic noodles.author: Megan W.
garlic noodles.review: When I was a toddler my parents came here for the same delicious crab and garlic noodles they serve now, only before Crustacean made them famous and high-end, the prices were low enough for bike messengers to afford.

excerpts: Garlic noodles are perfect it's very easy to eat an order or two.
garlic noodles.author: Sarah T.
garlic noodles.review: Let me see if I can count right, there was 6 of us that ate here. We called ahead & made reservations, it was really busy for a Sunday evening. They even called us to check on us when we were 15minutes late, which is great customer service. Okay appetizers the calamari was soo good enough said. I didn't like the tempura prawns since the batter had coconut shreds on them, I'm not a coconut person. Garlic noodles are perfect it's very easy to eat an order or two. The drunken crab was really good,  one crab can barely feed two people & it was so easy to get the crab meat out since the shell was semi soft.  The moultan chocolate cake however made me smile. *Beware* I brushed my teeth about 5 times & couldn't get the garlic taste out of my mouth, also the next morning my clothes, smelled of garlic bad, I mean really, really bad! Thinking about sending them my dry cleaning bill.

excerpts: My friend always orders the garlic noodles on the side
and I can't help but grab a few bites of it.
This place is so good that a co-workers friend was visiting from San Diego and it was a MUST that she dine at Thanh Long!
Woo-hoo for sure!
garlic noodles.author: Sherryl Z.
garlic noodles.review: Hell yeah, this place is sooo friggin good! I have dreams about that delicious crab dish! I moved about an hour and a half away and I've been craving for Thanh Long! I think I'll have a hard time finding a spot that's as good as this in my new area. I remember we had to valet the car, so bring extra cash for that because there wasn't a lot of parking when I went. I can't wait to go back to SF and eat here again. My friends and I compared this spot to Crustacean (also in SF) and we agreed that Thanh Long is better! The service was okay I guess, nothing spectacular, but the servers are always running around so they're never too far away for very long. Don't ask me about the price, I'm sure it was affordable and worth it. I remember the valet kind of took awhile and it was kinda cold waiting outside in SF. And I've heard they are the same owners as Crustacean but I think Thanh Long is less expensive and not as dressy as Crustacean. We made reservations, which I believe was a good idea since it seemed pretty packed when we went, which was on a weekend. My friend always orders the garlic noodles on the side and I can't help but grab a few bites of it. This place is so good that a co-workers friend was visiting from San Diego and it was a MUST that she dine at Thanh Long! Woo-hoo for sure!

excerpts: Although menu has an extensive selection, truthfully the only thing worth eating is the roast crab and garlic noodles.
I feel that review's bad rating is probably because they order some mundane things on the menu.
The place is a bit pricey but the crab is definitely worth the money.
*Just a simple tip to those who are thinking of trying this resteraunt... although this resteraunt is classy and the food is great...
I wouldn't take a girl you're trying to impress to this resteraunt.
I mean seriously... would you really want to be cracking open crab shells, sucking on your fingers and hoovering over garlic noodle on your first date?
And worst possible case is that you accidently crack open a crab and spits all over your date's face.
garlic noodles.author: Kumiko N.
garlic noodles.review: All-time favorite resteraunt to eat at in SF for great crab. Although menu has an extensive selection, truthfully the only thing worth eating is the roast crab and garlic noodles. I feel that review's bad rating is probably because they order some mundane things on the menu. The place is a bit pricey but the crab is definitely worth the money. ***Just a simple tip to those who are thinking of trying this resteraunt... although this resteraunt is classy and the food is great... I wouldn't take a girl you're trying to impress to this resteraunt. I mean seriously... would you really want to be cracking open crab shells, sucking on your fingers and hoovering over garlic noodle on your first date? And worst possible case is that you accidently crack open a crab and spits all over your date's face.

excerpts: get the garlic noodles.
garlic noodles.author: Mel L.
garlic noodles.review:
i don't think i have anything to say that hasn't been said. but i have to add my vote, right? 
get the roast crab. get the garlic noodles. love them. 

i HATE fish but my dad got the sea bass and it was surprisingly for me, good! no fishy flavor at all! it's the first time i've had anything good to say about fish. 

skip the lemongrass chicken - it's pretty tough and nothing special. MAKE reservations!!! the wait can be ridiculous. there's valet parking but it's about $10 i think. just park a couple blocks away... you'll need to walk it off after your dinner anyway :D 

yes, it's pricey... it's definitely a place that's worth a try, at the very least.

excerpts: Love the garlic noodles and roasted crab (always fresh), excellent cocktails (will have to try the pineapple lychee martini when I visit again), and outstanding service.
If you love crab, you should try this restaurant.
garlic noodles.author: Joyce B.
garlic noodles.review: My favorite restaurant.  Love the garlic noodles and roasted crab (always fresh), excellent cocktails (will have to try the pineapple lychee martini when I visit again), and outstanding service.  If you love crab, you should try this restaurant.

excerpts: Get the roast crab and garlic noodles and you'll leave extremely satisfied.
It's messy, it'll clog up your arteries (lots 'o butter), and you might wreak of garlic, but it's an important indulgence that you should partake in at some point in your life.
garlic noodles.author: Russ T.
garlic noodles.review: Forget Crustacean, go to the original. It's got a better ambiance even if the food is the same. Get the roast crab and garlic noodles and you'll leave extremely satisfied. It's messy, it'll clog up your arteries (lots 'o butter), and you might wreak of garlic, but it's an important indulgence that you should partake in at some point in your life.

excerpts: Each daughter is stationed at each resturant, and classics like the GARLIC NOODLES, or CRAB are ONLY MADE BY THE DAUGHTERS IN A SECRET KITCHEN. if you dont believe me, ask when you eat dinner, its true!
Cool shit, is all I can say
garlic noodles.author: Liz C.
garlic noodles.review: I actually know the entire story of this most delicious resturant in the sunset. Its a really long ass story; here is the short version. Anna An was somewhat of a princess in Vietnam. She had three cooks growing up, one from France, one from China and the other from Vietnam. During the 1950's her father lost power and she and her husband were forced out. She came to SF with her three daughters and with her money, bought a building ( the original site on Judah) and began to cook the recipes from her past. Her husband soon followed and now she has two resturants in the city ( Crustaceans) one in LA and one in Vegas. Each daughter is stationed at each resturant, and classics like the GARLIC NOODLES, or CRAB are ONLY MADE BY THE DAUGHTERS IN A SECRET KITCHEN. if you dont believe me, ask when you eat dinner, its true!  Cool shit, is all I can say

excerpts: The garlic noodles are just out of this world
and I'm not a big crab fan, but I couldn't pass it up since my friends raved about it so much.
I think the food is tastier here than at their sister restaurant Crustaceans and it is not as formal.
And the dessert we had was yummy as well.
I'll be coming back here for more soon.
garlic noodles.author: Chris G.
garlic noodles.review: The garlic noodles are just out of this world and I'm not a big crab fan, but I couldn't pass it up since my friends raved about it so much.   I think the food is tastier here than at their sister restaurant Crustaceans and it is not as formal.  And the dessert we had was yummy as well. I'll be coming back here for more soon.

excerpts: The accompanying signature dishes are superb: garlic noodles, peppered calamari and Shaken (it used to be Saigon?)
beef.

This place is cozier and better decorated than their sister restaurant on California Street ("Crustaceans" feels like a typical Fisherman Wharf place with their 80s ocean-theamed decor and glass-cube building structure).
On a downside: over years the average size of their crab has been gradually decreasing.
Still solid 5 stars.
garlic noodles.author: Mary R.
garlic noodles.review:
Above and beyond for an Asian restaurant in Outer Sunset neighborhood! Truly the tastiest roasted crab I've ever tried. It comes in a number of flavors (i.e., drunken crab etc.), but the simple "roasted" one is the best. The accompanying signature dishes are superb: garlic noodles, peppered calamari and Shaken (it used to be Saigon?) beef. 
This place is cozier and better decorated than their sister restaurant on California Street ("Crustaceans" feels like a typical Fisherman Wharf place with their 80s ocean-theamed decor and glass-cube building structure). 
On a downside: over years the average size of their crab has been gradually decreasing. Still solid 5 stars.

excerpts: if you love roasted crab and garlic noodles this is the place you must try.
I highly recommend making reservation for all great places you really do need them just to prevent a long wait and eating dinner close to bedtime..
Thanh Long is a sister restaurant to Crustaceans
but I like the family feel of this place great for groups and special occasions.
The crab is the tastiest crab I have had in SF and trust me
I'm a Cancer
and I know crab.
Also the garlic noodles goes well with the crab and that alone is worth going here.
The services is very good and just posting this review is getting me all worked up and wanting to make a trip for crab..... see you there!!!!
garlic noodles.author: Kwang C.
garlic noodles.review: if you love roasted crab and garlic noodles this is the place you must try. I highly recommend making reservation for all great places you really do need them just to prevent a long wait and eating dinner close to bedtime.. Thanh Long is a sister restaurant to Crustaceans but I like the family feel of this place great for groups and special occasions. The crab is the tastiest crab I have had in SF and trust me I'm a Cancer and I know crab. Also the garlic noodles goes well with the crab and that alone is worth going here. The services is very good and just posting this review is getting me all worked up and wanting to make a trip for crab..... see you there!!!!

excerpts: this is 2nd best to Crustaceans only cause the ambiance is better =)  don't eat here UNLESS you're going to order their crab and garlic noodles... nuff said!
garlic noodles.author: Kae B.
garlic noodles.review: this is 2nd best to Crustaceans only cause the ambiance is better =)  don't eat here UNLESS you're going to order their crab and garlic noodles... nuff said!

excerpts: And the crab, veggies and of course garlic noodles were perfect!
We almost had too much crab!
Note: Almost.
We celebrated with a bottle of Dom P which was a nice touch.
We splurged.
It's not a place I can afford more than once or twice a year (if I'm lucky) but it's well worth it!!
garlic noodles.author: Angela F.
garlic noodles.review: I took my mother here for her 60th b'day. I had been to crustacean's but was looking for the same food with casual attire. Well I found it. The place is very busy. The service is excellent. And the crab, veggies and of course garlic noodles were perfect! We almost had too much crab! Note: Almost. We celebrated with a bottle of Dom P which was a nice touch. We splurged. It's not a place I can afford more than once or twice a year (if I'm lucky) but it's well worth it!!

excerpts: Love drunken crab and garlic noodles!!!
Service was good.
Very attentive.
Can't wait to go again.
garlic noodles.author: K P.
garlic noodles.review: Love drunken crab and garlic noodles!!! Service was good. Very attentive. Can't wait to go again.

excerpts: Roasted crab and garlic noodles, so buttery, garlicy, rich and seasoned to perfection.
I was recommended to this restaurant by a friend who said it's so good it will make you cry - and he was so right, I was weeping in happiness.
The best, it is one of the highlights on our trips to the Bay area.
garlic noodles.author: June W.
garlic noodles.review: Roasted crab and garlic noodles, so buttery, garlicy, rich and seasoned to perfection.  I was recommended to this restaurant by a friend who said it's so good it will make you cry - and he was so right, I was weeping in happiness.  The best, it is one of the highlights on our trips to the Bay area.

excerpts: Everyone agrees that the baked crab and garlic noodles are to die for.
But you should also try the sea bass--light and fluffy, exquisite.
And get the BBQ squid for an appetizer.
My only complaint is when crab is not in season, the quality of what you get is mixed--have gotten some frozen, tasteless crab.
But I guess that when you drown it in butter and garlic, it can pretty much mask everything.
In general, they are good and tasty,but can be pricey.
garlic noodles.author: Nancy H.
garlic noodles.review: Of the two restuarants they own (Crusteacean on Polk), this is the better one.  Everyone agrees that the baked crab and garlic noodles are to die for. But you should also try the sea bass--light and fluffy, exquisite. And get the BBQ squid for an appetizer.  My only complaint is when crab is not in season, the quality of what you get is mixed--have gotten some frozen, tasteless crab.  But I guess that when you drown it in butter and garlic, it can pretty much mask everything.  In general, they are good and tasty,but can be pricey.

excerpts: The roasted crab is not-to-miss, as are the garlic noodles.
I'm not sure about the rest of the food, because I wouldn't stray from my favorites.
My Dad loved it so much that he keeps trying to get my to bring him some when I visit.
But I don't think the 6-hour flight to NJ would flatter the meal, and I'm sure my flight-mates would be unimpressed.
garlic noodles.author: Alissa R.
garlic noodles.review: This place is great for groups. The roasted crab is not-to-miss, as are the garlic noodles. I'm not sure about the rest of the food, because I wouldn't stray from my favorites. My Dad loved it so much that he keeps trying to get my to bring him some when I visit. But I don't think the 6-hour flight to NJ would flatter the meal, and I'm sure my flight-mates would be unimpressed.

excerpts: The roasted crab, garlic noodles, mussells and salmon carpoccio are all excellent.
Each have such a unique flavor, yet so perfect for my pallette.
Anyway, we love this place...
it's one of our favorites.
Oh, and try the Navarro Gewürztraminer (grape juice)...
it's an amazing non-alcoholic wine.
garlic noodles.author: Rob D.
garlic noodles.review: My wife took me to this restaurant for my birthday when we first met. Wow, this place is excellent! The roasted crab, garlic noodles, mussells and salmon carpoccio are all excellent. Each have such a unique flavor, yet so perfect for my pallette. Anyway, we love this place... it's one of our favorites. Oh, and try the Navarro Gewürztraminer (grape juice)... it's an amazing non-alcoholic wine.

excerpts: my personal recommendations are the roasted crab and garlic noodles.
just tried the mussels recently and they're pretty decent.
don't bother if you're not going to eat the crab and ask what else is good on the menu.
garlic noodles.author: Natalie S.
garlic noodles.review:
yes, this place gets crowded and for damn good reason! make a reservation if you don't want to wait, come a little early if you don't want to pay for valet because parking can be problematic in that area, and DON'T EAT TOO MUCH before you get in so you can savor your meal. oh yea.. if you plan on going out after, keep some mouthwash or gum handy because you're breath is guaranteed to be potent. 

my personal recommendations are the roasted crab and garlic noodles. just tried the mussels recently and they're pretty decent. don't bother if you're not going to eat the crab and ask what else is good on the menu.

excerpts: The garlic noodles and roasted crab is the best in town.
Parking is a hassle but they offer valet parking.
They also serve up a delicious lychee martini at the bar with their own lychee infused vodka.
Did I mention that the garlic noodles are amazing!
garlic noodles.author: Peter K.
garlic noodles.review: I've been going here every year for my Birthday! The garlic noodles and roasted crab is the best in town. Parking is a hassle but they offer valet parking. They also serve up a delicious lychee martini at the bar with their own lychee infused vodka. Did I mention that the garlic noodles are amazing!

excerpts: Great roasted crab and garlic noodles.
the mango seafood salad is also very tasty.
Its pretty expensive for seafood, but the quality is worth it.
Parking is insane.
Expect to search high and low for parking for about 30min.
but its well worth the wait
In some areas of the restaurant, you are sitting REALLY close you your neighboring table; Almost uncomfortably close.
So keep the conversations rated G, please ;)
garlic noodles.author: mike c.
garlic noodles.review: Great roasted crab and garlic noodles. the mango seafood salad is also very tasty. Its pretty expensive for seafood, but the quality is worth it. Parking is insane. Expect to search high and low for parking for about 30min. but its well worth the wait :) In some areas of the restaurant, you are sitting REALLY close you your neighboring table; Almost uncomfortably close. So keep the conversations rated G, please ;)

excerpts: the garlic noodles are a must!!
garlic noodles.author: Lena D.
garlic noodles.review: Last night I had a great dinner party~ Thanh Long has the best crab around...the garlic noodles are a must!!

excerpts: awesome roast crab and garlic noodles.
usually very busy so call ahead.
do yourself a favor and park your car yourself.
valet fee is a little steep.
garlic noodles.author: Jeff W.
garlic noodles.review: awesome roast crab and garlic noodles. usually very busy so call ahead. do yourself a favor and park your car yourself. valet fee is a little steep.

excerpts: I would fly to San Francisco for 24 hours just so I could have their Roasted Dungeness Crab and Garlic Noodles with Colossal Tiger Prawns.
Wow.
Words cannot express how much I love this place, eating these two dishes, and how much I've missed it since I moved out of the Bay Area.
Expect to pay $50 per person if you get drinks, and it's totally worth it!
garlic noodles.author: RonAnderson ..
garlic noodles.review: I would fly to San Francisco for 24 hours just so I could have their Roasted Dungeness Crab and Garlic Noodles with Colossal Tiger Prawns.  Wow.  Words cannot express how much I love this place, eating these two dishes, and how much I've missed it since I moved out of the Bay Area.  Expect to pay $50 per person if you get drinks, and it's totally worth it!

excerpts: You won't want them to miss out on this heavenly experience of garlic noodles and roasted crab!
It is the original of the Ahn family and it is still the best.
garlic noodles.author: Judy L.
garlic noodles.review: Take your parents here! You won't want them to miss out on this heavenly experience of garlic noodles and roasted crab! It is the original of the Ahn family and it is still the best.

excerpts: My friend favors the crab and garlic noodles...
the bib is mandatory.
garlic noodles.author: Bleep S.
garlic noodles.review: The best steamed sea bass EVER.  My friend favors the crab and garlic noodles...the bib is mandatory.

excerpts: To me, their only trick is roasted crab -- order it with garlic noodles.
Delicious, but they're definitely beat at their main game by another Bay Area establishment
you'll have to drive to (see my other reviews).
A bit on the pricey side, always busy (and hence on the noisy side), but you will get your food quickly with mostly friendly service.
garlic noodles.author: Alfonso E.
garlic noodles.review: To me, their only trick is roasted crab -- order it with garlic noodles.  Delicious, but they're definitely beat at their main game by another Bay Area establishment you'll have to drive to (see my other reviews).  A bit on the pricey side, always busy (and hence on the noisy side), but you will get your food quickly with mostly friendly service.

excerpts: the crab is good .. the garlic noodles are good .. but they're not superb ..

the crabs are a lot smaller than at PPQ .. at PPQ, when you crack the shell, you can remove a big, fat morsel of juicy crab meat in all of the legs .. not so at thanh long .. and i ate at PPQ 2 weeks before
garlic noodles.author: Anvy A.
garlic noodles.review:
4 stars for this place? seriously? looks like a lot of the reviewers here haven't been to PPQ yet .. i'd give this place a 3.5 but can't bear to actually give it a 4 ..

the crab is good .. the garlic noodles are good .. but they're not superb .. the crabs are a lot smaller than at PPQ .. at PPQ, when you crack the shell, you can remove a big, fat morsel of juicy crab meat in all of the legs .. not so at thanh long .. and i ate at PPQ 2 weeks before so i think the comparison is fair .. 

the shaken beef was unusually too sweet (i'm vietnamese .. so i'd like to think i know what to expect) .. 

i don't think i'll be coming back here.

excerpts: The roasted crab, garlic noodles with praws are absolutely amazing here.
This place is very nice!
This location is not as nice as their other location but there is no dress code enforced.
The food quality is consistent with the other locations.
Come here if you just want to enjoy good food without having to dress up.
Go to the other location if you want to turn the evenning into a special occasion.
Especially if you are a crab lover or garlic lover!
garlic noodles.author: Azizi A.
garlic noodles.review: The roasted crab, garlic noodles with praws are absolutely amazing here. This place is very nice! This location is not as nice as their other location but there is no dress code enforced. The food quality is consistent with the other locations. Come here if you just want to enjoy good food without having to dress up. Go to the other location if you want to turn the evenning into a special occasion. Must try!!!!!!!!!!! Especially if you are a crab lover or garlic lover!

excerpts: If I was ever stranded on a dessert island I would be perfectly content eating roast crab and garlic noodles for the rest of my life.
Since I've never really deviated from the roast crab or garlic noodles, I can't speak to the other entrees on the menu-- but crab is their specialty here, so why would you go with anything else?
My husband though, stubborn as he is has actually gotten the roast tiger prawns and the orange sea bass and he has enjoyed them.
The appetizers are great.
The fresh spring rolls are always a delight and the crab and corn soup is never a miss.
Since I've never really deviated from the roast crab or garlic noodles, I can't speak to the other entrees on the menu-- but crab is their specialty here, so why would you go with anything else?
My husband though, stubborn as he is has actually gotten the roast tiger prawns and the orange sea bass and he has enjoyed them.
The appetizers are great.
The fresh spring rolls are always a delight and the crab and corn soup is never a miss.
garlic noodles.author: Jennifer S.
garlic noodles.review: I love this place. If I was ever stranded on a dessert island I would be perfectly content eating roast crab and garlic noodles for the rest of my life. Since I've never really deviated from the roast crab or garlic noodles, I can't speak to the other entrees on the menu-- but crab is their specialty here, so why would you go with anything else? My husband though, stubborn as he is has actually gotten the roast tiger prawns and the orange sea bass and he has enjoyed them. The appetizers are great. The fresh spring rolls are always a delight and the crab and corn soup is never a miss.

excerpts: You have to try the garlic noodles or ELSE.
I'm excited that there's going to be another addition by the An Family down on Sutter.
garlic noodles.author: Beth W.
garlic noodles.review: So. Frickin. Good. You have to try the garlic noodles or ELSE. I'm excited that there's going to be another addition by the An Family down on Sutter.

excerpts: Get your bib on...nothing more to say and agreeing with the consensus...roasted garlic crab and garlic noodles.
Done.
garlic noodles.author: Jeff A.
garlic noodles.review: Get your bib on...nothing more to say and agreeing with the consensus...roasted garlic crab and garlic noodles.  Done.

excerpts: Like the other reviews, the garlic noodles are absolutely fabulous.
If there is just one thing on the menu that I can have day in and day out, it would have to be the garlic noodles.
And as far as the stinkiness goes, it wouldn't matter, because my family and boyfriend would love to have that garlic smell on them too if it meant eating the garlic noodles over and over again.
Okay, maybe just me!
garlic noodles.author: Margaret P.
garlic noodles.review: I haven't been here in awhile, but I LOVE this restaurant. Like the other reviews, the garlic noodles are absolutely fabulous. If there is just one thing on the menu that I can have day in and day out, it would have to be the garlic noodles. And as far as the stinkiness goes, it wouldn't matter, because my family and boyfriend would love to have that garlic smell on them too if it meant eating the garlic noodles over and over again. Okay, maybe just me! I have to give it up for the drunken crab and prawns as well.

excerpts: Good crab, good service, good garlic noodles.
It's good, but not stellar.
garlic noodles.author: Mar M.
garlic noodles.review: I think it's considered the best in town because it's one of few in SF that specialize in the crab experience. Good crab, good service, good garlic noodles. It's good, but not stellar.

excerpts: Stick with the roast crab and garlic noodles - everything else is usually a disappointment.
Apps are always tiny and taste so-so.
and if you order the right thing - meaning just the roast crab and garlic noodles, they are done really----well...
and if you order the right thing - meaning just the roast crab and garlic noodles, they are done really----well...
garlic noodles.author: Amina B.
garlic noodles.review: Stick with the roast crab and garlic noodles - everything else is usually a disappointment.  Apps are always tiny and taste so-so.  Against my better judgment, we also ordered the drunken crab this time and it was so--- fishy.  The waiter said the wine brings out the natural fishiness - but I could tell it wasn't the reason in this case- it just wasn't fresh.  But they were really good about removing it from our bill without even mentioning it.  Good service and if you order the right thing - meaning just the roast crab and garlic noodles, they are done really----well...

excerpts: I have vowed that for every birthday from here on out, all I really want is put on a bib and lick my fingers clean after eating some Roast Crab and garlic noodles.
I would like to go back again (on a non-birthday visit) and actually try the other delicious looking food on the menu.
But crab and garlic noodles?
That's special.
That's my birthday fare.
garlic noodles.author: Melani A.
garlic noodles.review: Hubby took me here for my birthday -  my second time ever at Thanh Long. I have vowed that for every birthday from here on out, all I really want is put on a bib and lick my fingers clean after eating some Roast Crab and garlic noodles. I would like to go back again (on a non-birthday visit) and actually try the other delicious looking food on the menu. But crab and garlic noodles? That's special. That's my birthday fare.

excerpts: As for me, I ordered the Garlic Noodles, and that's what it was a  plate of Noodles, I wasn't impressed at all.
I will not go back there, but if you like seafood, give it a try.
garlic noodles.author: Susie S.
garlic noodles.review: you have to love seafood. I took my Husband there on his birthday. He loves crab so thas what he ordered. Out comes a huge Crap he sat and cracked it open and ate every bit of it. As for me, I ordered the Garlic Noodles, and that's what it was a  plate of Noodles, I wasn't impressed at all.  I will not go back there, but if you like seafood, give it a try.

excerpts: Except of course for the crab puffs and garlic noodles.
One just cannot go to an An Family restaurant without ordering the garlic noodles at the very least.
I would give them an A- for the puffs and noodles.
Perhaps it was the missing ambiance, but the garlic noodles just didn't make me go mmm this time.
garlic noodles.author: Celeste A.
garlic noodles.review: Being long time patron of Crustaceans, we had high expectations of Thanh Long.  We ordered to go and actually stepped outside of our crab/lobster comfort zone and tried other menu items. Except of course for the crab puffs and garlic noodles.  One just cannot go to an An Family restaurant without ordering the garlic noodles at the very least.  I would give them an A- for the puffs and noodles.  Perhaps it was the missing ambiance, but the garlic noodles just didn't make me go mmm this time.  The seafood combination fried rice did, though.  The scallops, crab, and shrimp were flavorful, yet it wasn't too overpowering.  The Thanh Long red snapper was fresh and seasoned perfectly.  The Villager's favorite however, was overly seasoned.  I tasted the marinade more than the shrimp and pork medallions themselves.  I would come back more often if the prices were slightly lower.  I would give this 3 1/2 stars overall.  It's also a good kid-friendly alternative to Crustacean.

excerpts: Like everyone else and their grandmothers, I had the roast crab and garlic noodles.
I don't usually order crab because I don't like to get messy with my food, but this was worth it!
I will totally go and get messy again, and I won't stray from the hits.
garlic noodles.author: Angela M.
garlic noodles.review: Like everyone else and their grandmothers, I had the roast crab and garlic noodles.  I don't usually order crab because I don't like to get messy with my food, but this was worth it!  I will totally go and get messy again, and I won't stray from the hits.

excerpts: don't forget your garlic noodles...
garlic noodles.author: Jana A.
garlic noodles.review:
used to come here for an early dinner after a cool trips to the zoo... 

order the drunken crab... muy delishio...

roasted crab is ok.... 

don't forget your garlic noodles... muy importante

their mixed drinks are great too... nothing like eating drunken crab while being drunk!

excerpts: I've heard so much about the garlic crab and garlic noodles that I think my expectations may have been a bit high.
garlic noodles.author: Angela T.
garlic noodles.review:
I've heard so much about the garlic crab and garlic noodles that I think my expectations may have been a bit high.

I went on a slow night in the middle of the week. Seated quickly and very hungry, we placed our orders and drank tea awaiting the highly rated food.

I saw people sitting around me enjoying the food around me, and thought it was a good sign... and then the food came out. Entirely over buttered and over salted.... overpowering the flavor of the crab altogether. I couldn't finish the noodles because they were so salty. I couldn't get my tea refilled fast enough.

Perhaps I went on an off night. You decide for yourself if you're ok with the possibility of being parched for a while...

excerpts: The roasted crab and garlic noodles are a must have.
We tried the lemon grass beef and it was so tender and tasty.
We never get disappointed here.
You will love it!!!!
garlic noodles.author: Jason L.
garlic noodles.review: The roasted crab and garlic noodles are a must have.  We tried the lemon grass beef and it was so tender and tasty. We never get disappointed here. You will love it!!!!

excerpts: Their garlic noodles was better tham PPQ
but I did not come here to eat garlic noodles.
In short, if you want tasty crabs then I would not come here.
garlic noodles.author: kgarfield k.
garlic noodles.review: I have been to PPQ Dungeness Island and heard that this was also good.  They are two different restaurants.  Thanh Long is a fusion restaurant.  The atmosphere was more elegant but the price was higher and servings alot smaller.  I tried the drunken crab and garlic crab, they were not very tasty, both tasted as though it was boiled in water.  The crabs did not have much taste.  Their garlic noodles was better tham PPQ but I did not come here to eat garlic noodles.  In short, if you want tasty crabs then I would not come here.

I cannot emphasize how good the Garlic Noodles are - a must-have with every meal here from now on

The place literally stinks & you leave smelling like stink, but I am very interested in trying other menu items.  I cannot emphasize how good the Garlic Noodles are - a must-have with every meal here from now on although I wish they would serve bigger portions.

The staff is friendly & attentive, the food is a bit overpriced & parking is a biatch (they have valet), but I can see why people love this place.  The Drunken Crab sounds like an interesting dish... will order next time perhaps?

I went with some friends who are fans and we had the rosted crab and the garlic noodles.  Wonderful!  They even have valet parking.  The place has great energy and outstanding food.
